code: import React from'react';import{Users,Clock,TrendingUp,Activity}from'lucide-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DashboardStats=_ref=>{let{stats}=_ref;const statCards=[{title:'Total Entries',value:stats.totalEntries,icon:Clock,color:'text-blue-600',bgColor:'bg-blue-50'},{title:'Active Entries',value:stats.activeEntries,icon:Activity,color:'text-green-600',bgColor:'bg-green-50'},{title:'Total Hours',value:"".concat(stats.totalHours.toFixed(1),"h"),icon:TrendingUp,color:'text-purple-600',bgColor:'bg-purple-50'},{title:'Technicians Working',value:stats.techniciansWorking,icon:Users,color:'text-orange-600',bgColor:'bg-orange-50'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-6 mb-8",children:statCards.map((stat,index)=>{const IconComponent=stat.icon;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bg-white rounded-lg shadow-sm border border-gray-200 p-6",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"p-2 rounded-lg ".concat(stat.bgColor),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IconComponent,{className:"w-6 h-6 ".concat(stat.color)})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"ml-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-sm font-medium text-gray-600",children:stat.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900",children:stat.value})]})]})},index);})});};export default DashboardStats;
